Posts.Content: Apr 9, 2010 04:37PM mokobear wrote: Hi Angie. I'm sorry to hear about your diagnosis. I wanted to share a couple of articles with you. I included the links below. At times, while using my bluetooth, I would tuck my cell phone into my bra. During my mastectomy, 5 tumors were found in my right breast. I believe that is what caused my breast cancer. http://www.beawarefoundation.org/cellphonerisk.html http://www.ocregister.com/articles/cell-241683-breast-phones.html  Donna
Posts.Title: Coincidence? artistang TheBrightSide
